title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct definition.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Response must specifically describe how each factor contributes to devolutionary pressures (e.g., a desire for autonomy/separation/statehood, areas or peoples are isolated or less connected, increasing centrifugal forces within the country).

Three points are earned for three correct descriptions.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe how any of the following forces contribute to devolutionary pressures within a country:
The response correctly describes how one of the following forces contribute to devolutionary pressures within a country:
The response correctly describes how two of the following forces contribute to devolutionary pressures within a country:
The response correctly describes how each of the following three forces contribute to devolutionary pressures within a country:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Two points are earned for one correct identification and one correct explanation.
descriptions: The response does not correctly identify nor explain one political impact resulting from devolutionary pressures in either Spain or Nigeria.
The response does one of the following for EITHER Spain OR Nigeria:
The response does two of the following for either Spain or Nigeria:
